metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31597 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The xmlhttprequest-ssl package before 1.6.1 for Node.js disables SSL certificate validation by default, because rejectUnauthorized (when the property exists but is undefined) is considered to be false within the https.request function of Node.js. In other words, no certificate is ever rejected.

criterions.comment: node-xmlhttprequest-ssl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
